name: DUNGEM
description:
Introduction

DUNGEM is a game that survives as long as possible while avoiding falling dung from the sky. The original is SUBERUNKER and it's very easy and simple.

Enjoy it with bright music and funny sound effects.

I would appreciate it if you could leave a feedback.

Plan

This is not the final version.

There are a few ideas that will make the game more fun.

  • Real Character (Not square)
  • Score Record
  • Story Mode

may be updated next time.

Tips
  • If you get gem that falls, you will be invincible for a while.
